xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 10 March 2014
xwikidoc.content: <gauravsaini03> has joined #phenotips 01:53 <blink2> has quit 02:07 <mgsdcenter> has quit 02:09 <qubitex> has quit 04:29 <IonelPopescu> has joined #phenotips 04:33 <IonelPopescu> has quit 04:34 <gauravsaini03> has quit 04:35 <gauravsaini03> has joined #phenotips 05:26 <gauravsaini03> has quit 05:29 <gauravsaini03> has joined #phenotips 06:58 <SayAsh> has joined #phenotips 08:02 <blink2> has quit 08:09 <gauravsaini03> has quit 08:41 <IonelPopescu> has joined #phenotips 09:03 <IonelPopescu> has quit 09:03 <IonelPopescu> has joined #phenotips 09:32 <SayAsh> has quit 10:00 <SayAsh> has joined #phenotips 10:17 <new> has quit 10:20 <SayAsh> has quit 11:13 <SayAsh> has joined #phenotips 11:44 <GSOC-Dushyant> has quit 11:45 <GSOC-Dushyant> has joined #phenotips 11:51 <GSOC-Dushyant> has quit 11:52 <GSOC-Dushyant> has joined #phenotips 12:10 <SayAsh> has quit 12:36 <GSOC-Dushyant> has quit 12:46 <gauravsaini03> has joined #phenotips 13:32 <SayAsh> has joined #phenotips 13:52 <sdumitriu_[Away]> is now known as <sdumitriu> 13:56 <darklord> has joined #phenotips 13:58 <gauravsaini03> has quit 14:50 <aw1231> has joined #phenotips 15:06 <GSOC-Dushyant__> has joined #phenotips 15:07 <GSOC-Dushyant> has quit 15:07 <GSOC-Dushyant___> has joined #phenotips 15:10 <GSOC-Dushyant__> has quit 15:15 <aw1231> Hi GSOC-Dushyant___ 15:15 <GSOC-Dushyant___> hello alan 15:16 <aw1231> You are applying for GSOC I assume? 15:16 <GSOC-Dushyant___> yes 15:16 <aw1231> What project? Or are you doing one of your own? 15:17 <GSOC-Dushyant___> I was interested in two projects : 1 is UI for a mobile web app and the other is machine learning methods for modelling 15:24 <GSOC-Dushyant___> Alan your introduction ? 15:26 <aw1231> Cool. I'm most likely going to apply for the one related to medical ontologies. 15:26 <aw1231> I'm a student too. 15:27 <GSOC-Dushyant___> hmmm cool 15:28 <aw1231> :) Good luck! 15:28 <sdumitriu> Hey, don't forget that the student application period just started 15:28 <sdumitriu> "Don't delay, submit today!" 15:29 <aw1231> Will do! 15:29 <GSOC-Dushyant___> yes 15:30 <sdumitriu> The sooner you submit, the more constructive feedback the mentors can give you 15:31 <sdumitriu> And your application will be easier to remember than the dozens we get at the last moment 15:36 <GSOC-Dushyant___> i see 15:36 <GSOC-Dushyant___> thanks for the information 15:49 <SayAsh> has quit 15:50 <GSOC-Dushyant___> Hello 15:50 <sdumitriu> is now known as <sdumitriu_[Away]> 15:50 <GSOC-Dushyant___> i was getting this error while installing maven 15:50 <sdumitriu_[Away]> is now known as <sdumitriu> 15:50 <GSOC-Dushyant___> its giving me an error could not find tools.jar when its actualy there in the lib folder 15:51 <sdumitriu> GSOC-Dushyant___: Check that you have M2_HOME defined 15:51 <sdumitriu> And that Java is properly installed 15:51 <sdumitriu> What does "mvn -version" say? 15:51 <GSOC-Dushyant___> yes its installed 15:52 <GSOC-Dushyant___> Apache Maven 3.0.5 (r01de14724cdef164cd33c7c8c2fe155faf9602da; 2013-02-19 19:21:28+0530) Maven home: C:\Program Files\apache-maven-3.0.5 Java version: 1.7.0_51, vendor: Oracle Corporation Java home: C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7 Default locale: en_IN, platform encoding: Cp1252 OS name: "windows 7", version: "6.1", arch: "x86", family: "windows" C:\Users\admin\My Documents\GitHub\phenotips> 15:53 <GSOC-Dushyant___> this path " C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7/../lib/tools.jar" which the maven is generating does not seem to be proper 15:53 <GSOC-Dushyant___> the slashes do not seem to be in the right format 15:54 <sdumitriu> That should be fine, Java can handle both kinds of slashes 15:55 <sdumitriu> Sorry, but I have to go now, try to ask for help in #maven 15:55 <sdumitriu> is now known as <sdumitriu_[Away]> 15:55 <GSOC-Dushyant___> ok no problem 16:00 <GSOC-Dushyant> has quit 16:01 <aw1231> has quit 16:03 <scorpy> has joined #phenotips 16:06 <IonelPopescu> has quit 16:24 <mcupak> has quit 16:26 <scorpy> has quit 16:26 <todenis> has quit 16:26 <stinex> has quit 16:39 <GSOC-Dushyant___> has quit 16:56 <aw1231> has joined #phenotips 17:39 <aw1231> has quit 18:41 <darklord> has quit 18:59 <aw1231> has joined #phenotips 19:07 <sdumitriu_[Away]> is now known as <sdumitriu> 20:23 <IonelPopescu> has joined #phenotips 20:39 <aw1231> sdmitriu: I've submitted my application, what should I do next? 20:39 <aw1231> *sdumitriu 20:43 <sdumitriu> aw1231: Several things 20:43 <sdumitriu> - keep exploring PhenoTips, try to understand it better 20:44 <sdumitriu> - wait for feedback 20:44 <sdumitriu> - improve the application (you can edit it until the submission deadline) 20:44 <sdumitriu> - try to fix some bugs 20:47 <aw1231> I'm nervous to submit a bugfix, mostly because I don't know whether it will be acceptable. 20:48 <sdumitriu> Well, that's part of your training 20:48 <aw1231> :) alright 20:51 <sdumitriu> aw1231: Looking at your application, make sure you can provide Google with proof of enrollment; to be eligible, you must be considered a student on April 21 20:51 <sdumitriu> http://www.google-melange.com/gsoc/document/show/gsoc_program/google/gsoc2014/proofofenrollment 20:51 <aw1231> Yes, I have. 20:53 <aw1231> has quit 21:08 <IonelPopescu> has quit 21:11 <sdumitriu> is now known as <sdumitriu_[Away]> 21:42 <SayAsh> has joined #phenotips 22:23 <SayAsh> has quit 22:51 <sonia> has quit
